subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text:
Probably non-Sino-Tibetan; compare {{cog|hmx-mie-pro|*kluŋᴬ||rainbow}}, {{cog|th|รุ้ง||rainbow}}, {{cog|za|duzdoengz|duz'''doengz'''|rainbow}}, {{m|za|saidoengz|sai'''doengz'''|rainbow}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{zh-ref|Benedict (1986)}} and {{zh-ref|Carr (1990)}} relate this to {{och-l|龍|dragon}} and {{och-l|紅|red}}.
